author: Special Correspondent
text:
Sanjay Mathur, Commissioner of Police, flagging off the 'Bishop Heber college Golden jubilee celebrations' rally in Tiruchi on Wednesday.— PHOTO: A. MURALITHARAN

The Golden Jubilee celebrations of Bishop Heber College, one of the premier higher educational institutions in Tiruchi, began here on Wednesday.

A special meeting was arranged on the campus to mark the beginning of a year-long celebrations. G. Dyvasirandam, Moderator, Church of South India, Rev. G. Paul Vasanthakumar, Bishop and Chairman CSI, Tiruchi – Thanjavur Diocese, and D. Paul Dhayabaran, Principal, participated. Later, a rally was organised from Bishop Heber School at Teppakulam to Bishop Heber College.

Sanjay Mathur, Commissioner of Police, Tiruchi, flagged off the rally.

More than 1,000 people, including faculty members, teachers, non-teaching staff members, and students participated in it. They carried placards highlighting the contribution of the college to the society.
title: Bishop Heber College jubilee begins with a rally
